about_the_game:
Long, long ago, there was a race with spiritual power, who sought inner peace and mastered the spiritual power centered on love. They were kind and powerful, guarding the earth. At the same time, there emerged a race representing material power, who sought material desires and power from the outside, constantly creating artificial intelligence robots to serve themselves. Due to the invention of machines, the balance of natural ecology has been disrupted, and the earth's resources continue to deplete. As the Earth was about to be destroyed, a war had to be launched to protect it, and a great battle of prehistoric civilizations began. Both races represent their respective civilizations and adhere to their own beliefs. Collide and merge with each other! In the end, both major races paid a tragic price! The Earth has finally been saved. Two civilizations have also disappeared forever from history!

Player 1: Use the WSAD key to control movement, double-click the directional keys to run, use the J key to attack, use the K key to jump, use the L key to defend and restore magic, and use the UIO key for special skill attacks

Player 2: Use the directional keys to control movement, double-click the directional keys to run, use the 1 key to attack, use the 2 key to jump, use the 3 key to defend and restore magic, and use the 456 key for special skill attacks

Dragon and Phoenix "is a magnificent action fighting game!

Regarding this game, the trial version can be played as a single player or two player game. The game features a large number of different types of characters, but these characters are not yet fully developed. However, you can still play the game and freely choose the character you like. Each character has its own characteristics and requires you to explore its mysteries. Double clicking on the directional building allows you to run and jump to attack! Some of these character directional key combinations can also trigger new moves.

The full version can be played as a single player or a two player game, and you can choose three characters, two of which are NPCs to help you fight. You can also add some new characters to choose from, and each character is more complete. Add some new level modes!

Hope: I hope you enjoy this game and find joy in it!
